cn.crowdos.kernel

接口 CrowdKernel

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Kernel

    public interface CrowdKernel
    CrowdOS is a ubiquitous operating system for Crowdsoucring and Mobile Crowdsensing, which can deal with multiple types of crowdsourcing problems simultaneously. CrowdOS kernel provide three core frameworks including Task Resolution and Assignment Framework (TRAF), Integrated Resource Management (IRM), and Task Result quality Optimization (TRO).
